LanguageData.ATPP_AlertHot3DevicesDesc: One or more of your computers have reached the maximum temperature threshold! Please quickly restore a suitable temperature!
LanguageData.ATPP_AlertHot2DevicesDesc: One or more of your computers is warm, please quickly lower the ambient temperature!
LanguageData.ATPP_AlertUnsecurisedClientsDesc: Warning you have potentially {0} SkyMind clients which can be hacked through the network, build security servers to avoid this.
LanguageData.ATPP_IncidentSurrogateHackingLiteDesc: Your security system has neutralized part of the attack, however some subsystems of {0} surrogates have been compromised.
LanguageData.ATPP_IncidentSurrogateHackingHardDesc: Your security system does not protect your entire fleet of surrogate androids, the operating systems of {0} androids have been completely compromised.
LanguageData.ATPP_IncidentVirusedDesc: These surrogates are now completely under the control of the virus and will now attack you!
LanguageData.ATPP_IncidentVirusedExplosiveDesc: These surrogates are now completely under the control of the virus will now attack you and make the internal surrogate battery explode at the end of a countdown!
LanguageData.ATPP_IncidentCryptolockerDesc: All infected surrogates are completely unusable, this can be cancelled (hopefully) by paying a ransom to the faction behind this attack.
LanguageData.ATPP_IncidentDeviceHackingLiteDesc: Your security system has neutralized part of the attack, however {0} connected devices have been temporarily compromised.
LanguageData.ATPP_IncidentDeviceHackingHardDesc: Your security system does not protect all connected devices, the operating systems of {0} connected devices have been completely compromised.
LanguageData.ATPP_IncidentDeviceVirusedDesc: These devices are now completely under the control of the virus!
LanguageData.ATPP_IncidentDeviceVirusedExplosiveDesc: These devices are now completely under the control of the virus and will explode at the end of a countdown!
LanguageData.ATPP_IncidentDeviceCryptolockerDesc: All infected devices are completely unusable, this can be cancelled (hopefully) by paying a ransom to the faction behind this attack.
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterFactionRansomwareSkillStolenD: {0} has corrupted memory areas corresponding to the '{1}' skill of {2}'s brain, via the SkyMind network.
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterFactionRansomwareBadTraitDown: {0} have infected {1}'s brain and installed the bad trait '{2}', via the SkyMind network.
LanguageData.ATPP_EnergyNeedDesc: Energy is the amount of power an android has in its internal battery. If it is at zero, an android will increasingly malfunction and eventually be deactivated (die).
LanguageData.ATPP_NanoKitsNoKitJustVisit: Visit of the technician without nanokits
LanguageData.ATPP_ExplosiveVirus: Explosive Virus: {0} seconds before the battery explodes!
LanguageData.ATPP_AutoDoorOpenDescription: Open remotely via a SkyCloud core.
LanguageData.ATPP_AutoDoorCloseDescription: Close remotely via a SkyCloud server.
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterSurrogateDisabledDesc: Surrogate {0} is no longer operational following a violent attack on its physical integrity.
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterUploadOKDesc: The upload of {0}'s mind is complete and has now been transferred into {1}'s artificial brain, {1} is now dead (mind crushed).
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterPermuteOKDesc: The mind permutation is complete, {0} and {1} have now permuted bodies.
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterDuplicateOKDesc: The mind duplication is complete, the brain of {1} now contains a duplication of {0}'s brain, {1} can now be considered as dead.
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterSkyCloudUploadOKDesc: The mind upload to SkyCloud is complete, the consciousness of {0} is now stored in {1}'s central memory.
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterSkyCloudReplicateOKDesc: Replication of {0}'s neural network in the memory of {1} is complete.
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterSkyCloudDownloadOKDesc: The mind download from SkyCloud is complete, the consciousness of {0} is now stored in {1}'s central memory.
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterSkyCloudMigrateOKDesc: The mind migration of {0} from {1} to {2} is now complete.
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterInterruptedUploadDesc: Fatal Error: The transfer of consciousness has been interrupted, leading to a definitive corruption of the two brains (death).{0}
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterInterruptedUploadDescCompDico: One or both of the two colonists are no longer connected to SkyMind.
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterFactionScamCryptolockerDesc: {0} decided not to delete the cryptolocker virus that contaminated your colony, they scammed you...
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterFactionScamRansomwareDesc: {0} decided not to cancel the effect of their ransomware, they scammed you...
LanguageData.ATPP_CryptolockerNeedPayRansom: {0} contacts you via radio. They are behind the virus cryptolocker attack, they will remove their virus in exchange of {1} silver.
LanguageData.ATPP_RansomNeedPayRansomCorruptedSKill: {0} contacts you via radio. They are behind the ransomware attack, they will restore the corrupted '{1}' skill of {2} in exchange of {3} silver.
LanguageData.ATPP_RansomNeedPayRansomDownloadedTrait: {0} contacts you via radio. They are behind the ransomware attack, they will remove the installed bad trait '{1}' of {2} in exchange of {3} silver.
LanguageData.ATPP_ComptHeatSensitiveComputerMeltDesc: A server exploded due to its high operating temperature!
LanguageData.ATPP_destroyedMindsDueToDestroyedSkyClou: Following the destruction of SkyCloud Core {0}, all {1} consciousnesses stored in its central memory were lost.
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterHackingPointsRemovedDesc: All hacking servers in your settlement(s) are offline which implies that {0} points have been lost since they can no longer be stored on any media!
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterSkillPointsRemovedDesc: All skill servers in your settlement(s) are offline which implies that {0} points have been lost since they can no longer be stored on any media!
LanguageData.ATPP_SkyCloudCoreBootedDesc: The SkyCloud server {0} has started successfully, and can now be used.
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterInterruptedSkyCloudReplicatio: Replication of {0}'s consciousness failed, because the host SkyCloud core is offline.
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterInterruptedSkyCloudMigrationD: Migration of {0}'s consciousness failed, because the destination SkyCloud core is offline.
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterTraitorOfflineDesc: {0} betrayed his faction by letting himself be recruited by you, the faction noticed it and he was arrested (he is therefore disconnected from the surrogate he controlled).
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterInterruptedMindAbsorptionDesc: The mind absorption of {0} failed either due to a disconnection of skymind or to the fact that no point server is operational.
LanguageData.ATPP_MindAbsorptionDoneDesc: Mind absorption of {0} done, {1} skill points earned
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterExternalSurrogateEscapeDesc: {0} the controller of the surrogate you are trying to recruit has decided to join your colony, he will disconnect from his surrogate and flee discreetly the enemy base in which he is to join your colony within several days without knowing exactly when.
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterExternalSurrogateControllerJo: {0} a surrogate controller that you imprisoned and successfully converted has just arrived at your colony and joined you.
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterExternalSurrogateControllerCa: {0} a surrogate controller that you imprisoned and successfully converted has tried to reach your colony, but for some unknown reason was unsuccessful and therefore left.
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterExternalSurrogateDisconnectDe: {0} the controller of the surrogate you tried to enslave disconnected because he and his faction feels they will no longer be able to get information from your colony and continue as a slave would be a waste of time.
LanguageData.ATPP_LetterKidnappedM8DisconnectedDesc: The kidnappers of your M8 ({0} hosting {1}) ended up gaining access to these communications circuits, realizing that the machine continued to communicate through its integrated SkyMind antenna, they disconnected it. So you will no longer be able to log in to {1}.
LanguageData.ATPP_DesignatorNeedSelectSX: Error: You must select a valid device connected to the SkyMind network!
LanguageData.ATPP_DesignatorNeedSelectSXToHack: Error: You must select a surrogate android controlled by a faction other than yours!
LanguageData.ATPP_SkyMindConnDesc: Connect this colonist to the SkyMind network to allow mind upload/permutation/duplication or remotely control SX series androids or biological surrogates.
LanguageData.ATPP_SkyMindAutoConnDesc: When disconnected from the SkyMind network, this device will try to reconnect automatically when there are free slots.
LanguageData.ATPP_DuplicateDesc: Duplicate the consciousness of the currently selected colonist to another.
LanguageData.ATPP_PermuteDesc: Permute the consciousness of the currently selected colonist with another.
LanguageData.ATPP_EnableSurrogateControlModeDesc: Enable remote control mode, allowing this colonist to control an SX series android or biological surrogate.
LanguageData.ATPP_AndroidToControlTargetDisconnectDes: Stop the current remote control session.
LanguageData.ATPP_AndroidToControlTargetDesc: Take control of the selected node.
LanguageData.ATPP_AndroidToControlTargetRecoverCarava: Recover a disconnected surrogate in a caravan.
LanguageData.ATPP_FreeControllerInCaravanDesc: Connect this surrogate to a free controller in a caravan
LanguageData.ATPP_AndroidSurrogateReconnectToLastCont: Reconnect the surrogate (if possible) to the last user who used it
LanguageData.ATPP_NoVX2Recipient: No available colonists (they need to have the VX2 chip brain implant).
LanguageData.ATPP_ConsciousnessUploadNoRecipient: No recipient available as a download destination.
LanguageData.ATPP_UploadConsciousnessDesc: Upload mind from this android to another.
LanguageData.ATPP_WarningSkyMindDisconnectionRisk: Warning no disconnections from SkyMind network must take place during the operation because it will corrupt their brains and therefore kill them
LanguageData.ATPP_UploadConsciousnessConfirmDesc: By validating, {0} will upload their mind into {1}'s body, which will crush {1}'s mind (kill them) and {0}'s body will be disabled, are you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.ATPP_PermuteConsciousnessConfirmDesc: By validating, {0} will permute their mind with {1}, they will exchange their bodies, are you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.ATPP_DuplicateConsciousnessConfirmDesc: By validating, {0} will duplicate their mind into {1}'s brain, which will crush {1}'s mind (kill them), are you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.ATPP_UseBatteryDesc: If enabled this will set the android to directly use their internal battery instead of their biomass generator.
LanguageData.ATPP_RepairAndroidsDesc: Allow this colonist to repair androids.
LanguageData.ATPP_UploadVirusDesc: Upload a virus in the targeted surrogate.
LanguageData.ATPP_UploadExplosiveVirusDesc: Upload a virus to the targeted surrogate which will overload the internal battery making it explode.
LanguageData.ATPP_HackDesc: Hack and take control of the targeted surrogate.
LanguageData.ATPP_HackTempDesc: Do a quick hack to take temporary control of the targeted surrogate.
LanguageData.ATPP_MoveToSkyCloudDesc: This operation will move the host's mind into a SkyCloud core, which will make them almost immortal, but leaving their body dead.
LanguageData.ATPP_MoveFromSkyCloudDesc: This operation will move the selected mind stored in a SkyCloud core into the host's brain.
LanguageData.ATPP_ProcessRemoveDescConfirm: By confirming the consciousness of {0} will be totally removed from the memory of {1}, they will be considered as dead!
LanguageData.ATPP_ProcessAssistDesc: Assign the list of stored minds used only to assist your colonists connected to the SkyMind network, they will get global mood boost for each mind assigned here.
LanguageData.ATPP_ProcessMigrateDesc: Migrate a consciousness from this SkyCloud core to another
LanguageData.ATPP_SkillsDesc: Open the skills workshop, which will allow you to convert the skill points generated by your servers into additional skills for your androids
LanguageData.ATPP_MindAbsorptionDesc: Absorb the mind of a prisoner in order to convert it into skill points (lethal operation)
LanguageData.ATPP_MindAbsorptionConfirmDesc: By confirming, consciousness of {0} will be absorbed and converted into skill points (lethal operation), are you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.ATPP_UploadMakeAndroidBatteryOverloadCon: Be careful when validating the battery of the selected android going to overload and will explode after a short time. Do you really want to continue?
LanguageData.ATPP_OverloadAndroidDesc: Make the android battery to explode
LanguageData.ATPP_CannotUseEveryPlaceUsed: Cannot use, the charging station is full.
LanguageData.ATPP_CannotUseBecauseNotInBatteryMode: Cannot use because the internal battery of the selected android is not set as default generator.
LanguageData.ATPP_CannotConnectToSkyMindNoNet: Cannot connect to SkyMind, no network available!
LanguageData.ATPP_CannotConnectToSkyMind: Cannot connect to SkyMind, not enough slots available!
LanguageData.ATPP_SurrogateUnexpectedDisconnection: Unexpected disconnection: {0} is no longer connected to the SkyMind network!
LanguageData.ATPP_SurrogateConnectionCannotBeDisconne: Cannot disconnect, {0} is currently in an unstable mental state
LanguageData.ATPP_StartPermute: The permutation of consciousnesses between {0} and {1} has begun!
LanguageData.ATPP_StartDuplicate: The duplication of {0}'s consciousness to {1} has begun!
LanguageData.ATPP_StartSkyCloudUpload: The upload of {0}'s consciousness into {1} has begun!
LanguageData.ATPP_StartSkyCloudUploadFailedFull: The upload of {0}'s consciousness into {1} cannot be done, because there is not enought consciousness storage space in {1}
LanguageData.ATPP_StartSkyCloudDownload: The download of {0}'s consciousness into {1}'s brain has begun!
LanguageData.ATPP_StartSkyCloudMigration: The migration of {0}'s consciousness from {1} to {2} has begun!
LanguageData.ATPP_StartSkyCloudMigrationFailed: The migration of {0}'s consciousness in {1} cannot be done, because there is not enought consciousness storage space in {1}
LanguageData.ATPP_StartUpload: The uploading of {0}'s consciousness to {1} has begun!
LanguageData.ATPP_CanOnlyBeUsedByAndroid: This device can only be used by androids!
LanguageData.ATPP_CannotBeUsedBecauseNoOldAgeIssues: Cannot be used because no android old age issues were found
LanguageData.ATPP_NoBrokenStuffFound: No issues where found for android {0}!
LanguageData.ATPP_BrokenStuffRepairFailed: Error: nanites have failed to repair!
LanguageData.ATPP_BrokenCPURepaired: Artificial brain has been repaired successfully!
LanguageData.ATPP_BrokenHydraulicSystemRepaired: The hydraulic system has been repaired successfully!
LanguageData.ATPP_BrokenCoolingSystemRepaired: The cooling system has been repaired successfully!
LanguageData.ATPP_BrokenFrameworkRepaired: The framework has been repaired successfully!
LanguageData.ATPP_CryptolockerClearedByFaction: {0} cleared their cryptolocker virus from your infected surrogate!
LanguageData.ATPP_CryptolockerDeviceClearedByFaction: {0} cleared their cryptolocker virus from your connected devices!
LanguageData.ATPP_RansomwareClearedByFaction: {0} made the necessary repairs for the damage caused to {1}
LanguageData.ATPP_CannotHackNotEnoughtHackingPoints: Not enough hacking points, {0} are required to hack!
LanguageData.ATPP_ProcessDuplicateOK: The neural network of {0} is being duplicated.
LanguageData.ATPP_ProcessDuplicateFailed: Cannot duplicate neural network of {0}, not enough consciousness storage space in the core
LanguageData.ATPP_ProcessRemoveOK: The neural network of {0} has been removed.
LanguageData.ATPP_ProcessAssistOK: {0}'s consciousness is now assigned to assist connected colonists.
LanguageData.ATPP_ProcessUnassistOK: {0}'s consciousness is no longer assigned to assist connected colonists.
LanguageData.ATPP_ProcessNoLongerInMentalBreak: {0}'s consciousness stored in {1} is no longer having a mental break
LanguageData.ATPP_CannotReconnectToLastSurrogateContr: Cannot reconnect, the last surrogate controller is unavailable (busy,dead,not connected to SkyMinds...)
LanguageData.ATPP_SkillsWorkshopPointsConverted: {0} skill points have been added to {1}
LanguageData.ATPP_SkillsWorkshopAvailablePointsNote: Note : For this android model you need {0} skill points generated by your servers to generate 1 available point
LanguageData.ATPP_NotEnoughtSkillPoints: Not enough available skill points ! ({0} points required)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsDefaultAndroidGeneratorMode: Directly use internal battery (they charge via the powergrid)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsMindUploadPercentageFail: Risk that the transfer of consciousness fails ({0}%)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsNanitePercentageFail: Risk that nanites cannot repair androids ({0}%)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsCharchingStationWattIncreas: Increase of power consumed when a {0} is charging
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsFoodGenerateLessEnergy: Biomass (food) brings less energy to androids (2 times less than for humans)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsPercentageOfAndroidBatteryR: Percentage of battery charged each 6 seconds ({0}%)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsNbHoursMinServerRunningHotB: Minimum number of hours servers can run hot before exploding ({0}h)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsNbHoursMaxServerRunningHotB: Maximum number of hours servers can run hot before exploding ({0}h)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsNbHoursMinSkyCloudServerRun: Minimum number of hours SkyCloud cores can run hot before exploding ({0}h)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsNbHoursMaxSkyCloudServerRun: Maximum number of hours SkyCloud cores can run hot before exploding ({0}h)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsDelayExplosiveVirus: Number of seconds an android infected with an explosive virus explodes ({0}sec)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsRiskFactionNotRemoveCryptol: The risk of a faction not removing cryptolocker after you pay the ransom ({0}%)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsRiskGetLittleVirusEvenWithS: Risk that your connected clients catch a virus (attenuated impact) even with a security system covering all of them ({0}%)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsRiskFactionNotRemoveRansomw: The risk that a faction doesn't remove ransomware effects after you pay the ransom ({0}%)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsMinSilverToRemoveBadTrait: Minimum amount of silver to pay to remove bad trait ransomware
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsMaxSilverToRemoveBadTrait: Maximum amount of silver to pay to remove bad trait ransomware
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsRansomwareSilverPerSkillLev: Amount of silver to pay for corrruped skill ransomware per level
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsDisableSolarFlareImpactOnAn: Disable solar flare negative effects on androids
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsDisableSecurityStuff: Disable virus and hacking through SkyMind
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsPercentageOfSurrogateInAnot: Minimum percentage of surrogates who may be present in groups of other factions ({0}%)
Maximum Percentage of surrogates who may be present in groups of other factions ({0}%)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsOtherFactionsCanUseSurrogat: Other factions can use surrogate androids
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsTempHackDuration: Duration of temporary surrogate hack ({0} seconds)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsDuringSolarFlareAndroidsSho: During solar flares androids are downed
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsDisableLowNetworkMalusInCar: Disable low SkyMind network penality in caravans
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsPowerConsumedByStoredMind: Power consumed by each stored mind in SkyCloud Cores
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsMindUploadToSkyCloudDuratio: Duration of mind upload to SkyCloud ({0}h)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsHideRemotelyControlledIcon: Hide icon on top of remotely controlled devices
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsSkyCloudBuffPerAssistingMin: Number of buff points per SkyCloud assistance mind ({0})
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsNbSlotAddedForSkillServers: Number of slots added for {0} skill servers ({1})
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsNbSlotAddedForHackingServer: Number of slots added for {0} hacking servers ({1})
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsNbSlotAddedForSecurityServe: Number of slots added for {0} security servers ({1})
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsNbPointsProducedForHackingS: Number of points produced (each 30 seconds) for {0} hacking servers ({1})
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsMinNbHoursLiteHackingDevice: Minimum number of hours a lite device hacking attack can last ({0}h)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsMaxNbHoursLiteHackingDevice: Maximum number of hours a lite device hacking attack can last ({0}h)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsHideInactiveSurrogates: Hide inactive surrogates from colonist bar
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsAndroidsOnlyHealedByCrafter: Androids can only be healed by blacksmiths
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsMinDurationOfMindMentalBrea: Minimum duration of a digitized consciousness mental break ({0}h)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsMaxDurationOfMindMentalBrea: Maximum duration of a digitized consciousness mental break ({0}h)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsSecToBootASkyCloudCore: Start-up time of a SkyCloud Core ({0}sec)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsDisableAbilityOfSkyCloudSer: Disable the possibility for SkyCloud Cores to speak
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsNotRemoveAllTraitsOfBasicAn: Do not remove all traits from T1/T2 androids
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsNotRemoveSkillsPassionForBa: Do not remove all skill passions for T1/T2 androids
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsVX3MaxSurrogateControllable: Maximum number of surrogates controllable at the same time ({0})
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsNbPointsProducedForSkillSer: Number of points produced (every 30 seconds) for {0} skill servers ({1})
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsPreventM7T5AppearingInChara: Prevent T5/M7 from appearing in the characters creation screen
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsMinHoursNaniteBankFramework: Minimum number of hours required to apply the effect of structural nanite banks ({0}h)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsMaxHoursNaniteBankFramework: Maximum number of hours required to apply the effect of structural nanite banks ({0}h)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsNbSkillPointsPerSkill: Number of skill points required to produce one skill ({0})
LanguageData.ATPP_RemoveComfortNeedForT3T4: Remove comfort need for androids >= T3
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsAllowHumanDrugsForT3P: Allow human drugs for T3+ androids
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsUploadMindToSkyCloudCoreMod: Upload mind to SkyCloud Core mode :
LanguageData.ATTP_SettingsUploadMindToSkyCloudCoreMod: The source mind's body is killed
The source mind's neural chip automatically reconfigures its circuits in VX0 mode
Nothing happens to the body of the source mind (duplicate)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsRemoveSimpleMindedTraitOnUp: Remove simple minded trait when a T1 is transfered into more advanced host (human, T2+)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsChanceGeneratedAndroidCanBe: Chance that generated androids can be painted or rusted ({0}%)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsMinDaysBeforeAndroidsPainti: Minimum number of days before androids painting can rust ({0} days)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsMaxDaysBeforeAndroidsPainti: Maximum number of days before androids painting can rust ({0} days)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsAndroidsAreRare: Make androids rare for other faction (WARNING will remove all android factions)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsAllowAutoRepaint: Allow androids to automaticaly reschedule a paint operation when the curent paint will soon expire
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsAllowAutoRepaintPrisoned: Allow prisoned androids to reschedule a paint operation too
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsMaxAndroidByPortableLWPN: Maximum androids by portable LWPN emitter (Power++) ({0})
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsChanceCreatedAndroidsAreMal: Chance that created androids are male models ({0}%)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsHideAbilityToForceEatingLiv: Hide the floating menu allowing to force eating living plants
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsPassionCost: Skills points required to increase passion ({0})
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsAllowAndroidsToUseHospitalB: Allow androids to use hospital beds
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsPercentageOfOtherFactionSur: Percentage of chance of other factions surrogates to have an RX chip ({0}%)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsChanceRecruitedSurrogateCon: Chance recruited surrogate controller join your faction without being arrested ({0}%)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsMinHourBeforeKidnapperDisco: Minimum number of hours before kidnapped M8 will be disconnected from SkyMind ({0}h)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsMaxHourBeforeKidnapperDisco: Maximum number of hours before kidnapped M8 will be disconnected from SkyMind ({0}h)
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsAndroidOverloadBatteryProra: The power of the explosion and proportional to the battery level
LanguageData.ATPP_SettingsSetT1ResearchToIndustrialTe: Change T1 research to be industrial tech level instead of spacer
